title: Compactness criterion for families of quantum operations in the strong convergence topology and its applications
abstract:
A revised version of the compactness criterion for families of quantum operations in the strong convergence topology (obtained previously) is presented, along with a more detailed proof and the examples showing the necessity of this revision.
  Several criteria for the existence of a limit point of a sequence of quantum operations w.r.t. the strong convergence are obtained and discussed.
  Applications in different areas of quantum information theory are described.
